About Eric

Multimedia design backed up by professional practice.

Strategic thinking

Making the complicated simple

01

co-creating value

Eric Schall is a GIS practitioner who incorporates design thinking into traditional and modern GIS products by focusing on user experience. Eric knows how to produce results that are both technically excellent and delightful for users.

02

years of experience

Eric has worked at all levels of government and in the private sector (oil and gas industry) for over 15 years. Currently he is pushing the boundaries of GIS for a state Department of Transportation, while continuing his education in multimedia design.

Technical skill

Technically sound work

03

a wealth of knowledge

Eric is trained in a broad gamut of fields, allowing him to synthesize knowledge from science, technology, and business domains. Eric holds a B.S. in Wildlife & Fisheries Science from Texas A&M University, a Master of Geoscience from Texas A&M University, and a M.S. in Information Technology & Management from The University of Texas at Dallas. Eric is certified in Scrum, ITIL, and Business Analysis. Eric is currently pursuing an A.A.S. in Mobile & Web Application Development from Lone Star College.

04

continuous improvement

Eric focuses on continuously growing his knowledge, skills, and abilities. He pursues higher education, works on side projects, teaches others, and learns something from every experience.

Business knowledge

Solutions that meet business needs

05

a renaissance man

Eric enjoys traveling, visiting museums, zoos, and parks, working on DIY projects around the garage and garden, and listening to history podcasts. Eric also celebrated his 13th year of service in the Field Artillery as a Texas Army National Guard servicemember. Eric's next adventure is to complete the trifecta of Texas public university system Masters degrees by entering Texas Tech's M.A. in Heritage and Museum Sciences program.

!

put Eric to work for you

Let Eric bring this approach to your organization. Eric is ready to co-create value with you by bringing technical expertise and design thinking to bear against your business problems.
